mapper.select:
select
,
from security_content_approval where APPROVER_USER_ID like CONCAT('%',#{userId},'%') and APPROVAL_STATUS = #{approvalStatus} order by OPERATION_TIME desc

select
,
from security_content_approval where APPROVER_USER_ID like CONCAT('%',#{userId}::VARCHAR,'%') and APPROVAL_STATUS = #{approvalStatus} order by OPERATION_TIME desc

select
,
from security_content_approval where REAL_APPROVER_USER_ID = #{userId} and APPROVAL_STATUS != 0 order by OPERATION_TIME desc
select CONTENT_SECRECY,RECORD_ID from security_content_approval where RECORD_ID = #{uuid}
select from security_content_approval where MODULE_TABLE = #{moduleTable} and RECORD_ID = #{recordId} LIMIT 1
mapper.delete: delete from security_content_approval where MODULE_TABLE = #{moduleTable} and RECORD_ID = #{recordId}
